body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is James Griffin and I'm from Griffin Motors, how can I assist you today? May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Stephanie. Can you confirm your phone number? I need to verify it for security purposes.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's six double eight, two three four, five one six five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And can I also have your mailing address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three, Elm Street, apartment four nine, Seattle, Washington.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the information, Stephanie. I will look into the billing issue for you. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Just hoping to get this matter resolved.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Stephanie. Thank you for reaching out to us. I will work on this and get back to you soon. Goodbye for now.
